location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Elphinston, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Elphinston, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, requesting a statement of the pensions payable by the Residency and suggesting that in future they will be always paid in the month of July.
